title: 脚本方块插件怎么设置权限？
author: roof_789

replies.author: Doby_
replies.txt_content:
给玩家这两条权限就可以了
    - scriptblock.interact.use
    - scriptblock.walk.use
在游戏里输入
/mangaddp Builder scriptblock.interact.use
/mangaddp Builder scriptblock.walk.use
求采纳

replies.author: Deater
replies.txt_content:
在客户端下有op的情况下输入以下指令 在后台不用加/
    /mangaddp default scriptblock.interact.use 
    /mangaddp default scriptblock.walk.use

或者
    /mangaddp Builder scriptblock.interact.use 
    /mangaddp Builder scriptblock.walk.use

replies.author: Deeplovelyx
replies.txt_content: scriptblock.interact.use     -scriptblock.walk.use两条权限输入相应权限组即可
